name: Gift Scramble
description:
Santa’s workshop is an efficient workplace year round. However, when it’s the week of Christmas and everyone is running around to meet deadlines, even the best of workplaces can get things mixed up.

In this case, a few tags fell off of some of the gifts while being transferred to Santa’s sleigh! Each of you is the head of a different department. Since each of you has handled the gifts at one point in the process, you have a few clues from your department about which ones belong to whom!

The only way to solve the mystery is to share some of your information. However, you and the others want a promotion to the coveted position of Santa's Little Helper. Build up points, piece together the clues, and get ready to make a guess!

Gift Scramble is a semi-cooperative, deductive reasoning game with limited information, for 3 or more players. If the clues you share don’t reveal much, you’ll be left sweeping out the reindeer stables. If you reveal too much too soon though, you’ll be left in the cold as the others make their guesses. 

Find the right balance of information to offer, make your guesses at the right time, and you’ll earn the title Santa’s Little Helper by Christmas!

Gift Scramble is a part of the Holiday TTRPG Jam.
